sections.title: Introduction
sections.content:
Table content:
Hardware | PCI/USB ID | Working?
Touchpad | 04F3:312A | Yes
Keyboard |  | Yes
GPU (NVIDIA) | 10de:1c8c | Yes
GPU (AMD) | 1002:15d8 | Yes
Webcam | 0408:a061 | Yes
Ethernet | 10ec:8168 | Yes
Bluetooth | 04ca:3016 | Yes
Audio | 1022:15e3 | Yes
Microphone | 1022:15e3 | Yes
Wi-Fi | 168c:003e | Yes
TPM |  | Untested

sections.title: Accessibility
sections.content: The appearance of the BIOS is pretty simple (grey and blue), so it might work well with OCR software. It does not have mouse support

sections.title: Firmware
sections.content: fwupd does not support this device yet.

sections.title: GPU
sections.content: The NVIDIA GPU / AMD iGPU combo supports PRIME

sections.title: Function keys
sections.content:
Table content:
Key | Visible?1 | Marked?2 | Effect
Fn+F8 | Yes | Yes | XF86AudioMute
Fn+DownArrow | Yes | Yes | XF86AudioLowerVolume
Fn+UpArrow | Yes | Yes | XF86AudioRaiseVolume
Fn+PageDown | Yes | Yes | XF86AudioPrev
Fn+PageUp | Yes | Yes | XF86AudioPlay
Fn+End | Yes | Yes | XF86AudioNext
Fn+F9 | Yes | Yes | Step the keyboard backlight level down
Fn+F10 | Yes | Yes | Step the keyboard backlight level up
Fn+LeftArrow | Yes | Yes | XF86MonBrightnessDown
Fn+RightArrow | Yes | Yes | XF86MonBrightnessUp
Fn+F3 | Yes | Yes | XF86RFKill, will hard-block Wi-Fi and soft-block Bluetooth. Press again to disable
Fn+F6 | Yes | Yes | Turns the screen off, any keyboard action will wake it up
Fn+F4 | Yes | Yes | XF86Sleep
Fn+F11 | Yes | Yes | Pause
Fn+F12 | Yes | Yes | ScrollLock
Fn+Del | Yes | Yes | Insert

1. The key is visible to xev and similar tools
1. The physical key has a symbol on it, which describes its function
1. systemd-logind handles this by default
